discourse_list.title: ProgPoW Benchmarked, by a Ethereum Miner!

content.content: Please read and discuss. I hope I brought some facts into the ProgPoW debate that we can make informed decisions from.    Medium – 27 Mar 19    Comprehensive ProgPoW Benchmark By a miner, for the miners! Reading time: 17 min read
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is explaining a proposal called ProgPoW and has provided a comprehensive benchmark for it. The post invites readers to discuss the proposal and make informed decisions. The post also welcomes constructive criticism and questions about the proposal, and it may be subject to auditing and reviewing.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
